dialogue.speaker: hoot
dialogue.dialog: Why,``` it's so nice to see you again!

dialogue.speaker: hoot
dialogue.dialog: I'm just working a lot here. What're you up to so late at night?

construction.speaker: hoot
construction.dialog: Ooh! Construction worker.````` Must be hard work.

scientist.speaker: hoot
scientist.dialog: A scientist!`````` I knew you would listen to what I told you about chemistry.

wildlife.speaker: hoot
wildlife.dialog: A wildlife protector!````` I love animals!

dialogue.speaker: hoot
dialogue.dialog: Well, see ya!```` Nice talking to you.
